page.title: 08VOLUNTARY ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Guides was started in 1910,by Sir Robert Baden Powell's sister.It is still quite popular around the country.Another sort of Guide is a Brownie Guide.Between the age of 7 and 11,you are a Brownie and between 11 and 20 you are a Guide. With the Guides and Brownies you go camping,go on walks and play games.When you go on pack holidays you get a Ventures Badge. There are 22 cubs and 8 scouts in first Catforth scouts.There are six leaders all together.they are ,John Haythornthwaite,Jo Haythornthwaite, Kaa, and Neil. The scout leader is called Dave and the assistant leader is called Pauline.There is a five day camp in summer and a weekend camp in february.The base is on the Naval Base at Inskip.There are lots of proficiency badges.
